metadata.title: Koyal Wholesale 13" Scallop Charger Plates, Antique Finish, Bulk Acrylic Plastic Charger Plates, Table Setting, Tabletop, Tablescape for Wedding, Holidays, Events, Home Decor (4, White and Gold)
features: INCLUDES: Bulk set of 4 high quality antiqued white scalloped charger plates for upscale parties, wedding receptions and special events. Handcrafted paint finish.

SIZE: Includes 13 inch diameter plates. Center of plate measures 9 inches wide and rim 1.75 inches wide. Fits standard 9 inch plates and 10 inch plates. For decorative purpose only. Not for direct food contact.

MATERIALS: Our white and gold shell patterned edge textured plates are made of high quality plastic melamine. Safely holds dinner plates, luncheon plates, and dessert plates. White and gold finish is on the front only and the back of the charger plate is black. For decorative purpose only. Not for direct food contact.

DESIGN: Our charger plates are are designed for all occasions. Create a elegant look for weddings, events, parties, birthdays, baby showers, bridal showers, anniversaries, banquets, meetings, ceremony, housewarmings. Perfect for the patio, kitchen, dining room or holiday table settings.
HAND WASH ONLY: Simply wipe clean with damp cloth and store at room temperature. Not dishwasher or microwave safe. Not for direct food contact.
description: Instantly enhance each table setting with our elegant antique scallop charger plates. Our charger plates are durable and made for repeat use, great for rental, hire and all occasions. When hosting a dinner party the Koyal Wholesale selection of charger plates provides a variety of choice from metal, acrylic, glass and more. The white and gold shell patterned edges give a elegant romantic look that will wow your guests. Our charger plates are the excellent display plate to elevate the look of your table top for any occasion from weddings and special events to everyday parties. Add glitz and glamour to your party by pairing our charger plates with napkin ring holders, candle holders and floral centerpieces for the ultimate fine dining experience. Each charger plate set is packaged securely for safe arrival. Perfect for farmhouse, vintage, modern and classic event party themes.
